00042     class _OgreRefAppExport Joint

00046         enum JointType {
00048             JT_BALL,
00050             JT_SLIDER,
00052             JT_HINGE,
00054             JT_UNIVERSAL,
00056             JT_HINGE2
00057         };
00059         Joint(JointType jtype);
00060         virtual ~Joint() { if (mOdeJoint) delete mOdeJoint; }
00061 
00062 
00064         JointType getType(void);
00071         virtual void setAnchorPosition(const Vector3& point) = 0;

00075 
00076

00093         virtual const std::pair<Vector3, Vector3>& getAxes(void);

00096
